mapper.insert: insert into t_user(wxopenid, wxnickname, username, IDCardNo, phoneNo, registertime) value (#{user.wxOpenId}, #{user.wxNickName}, #{user.userName}, #{user.userId}, #{user.phoneNo}, now());
mapper.select: select id, wxopenid, username, wxnickname, IDCardNo, phoneNo, registertime from t_user where wxopenid = #{wxOpenId}
select id, wxOpenId, wxNickName, userName, IDCardNo, phoneNo from t_user where id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update t_user set username = #{userName}, IDCardNo = #{IDCardNo}, phoneNo = #{phoneNo} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select a.id, a.name, a.betTypes, b.balance from t_betsite a inner join t_user_betsite b on a.id = b.betsiteid where a.id in (select betsiteid from t_user_betsite t where t.userid = #{id});
